entities.description: Title of the survey, which is the 2022 National Survey on Drug Use and Health.
The contract number associated with the survey, which is HHSS283201700002C.
The project number associated with the survey, which is 0215638.
The deliverable number of the survey, which is 57.
The point of contact email for questions about the codebook and data file, which is Marlon.Daniel@samhsa.hhs.gov.
Organization for which the survey was prepared, which is the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration (SAMHSA) in Rockville, Maryland.
Organization that prepared the survey, which is RTI International in Research Triangle Park, North Carolina.
The name of the data file, which is puf2022_101923.
The date associated with the data file, which is October 25, 2023.
Recommended citation for the survey data and codebook.
